Melody Lin

Software Engineer. Adventurer.


About

Hello there! I'm Melody.

I was born and raised in California, educated in Boston, and am currently working in New York City as a software engineer.

When I'm not tip-tapping out code, I love breathing in the outdoors, sipping on a glass of wine, and having cozy, heart-to-hearts with good company.

Experience

I've acquired a diverse set of skills over a broad spectrum of professional and academic experiences. I will find you, and I will fix your problems.
